title: The Battle for Carry: An Analysis of ADC vs Mid Players and Post-Game Role Predictive Model
description: An analysis 2022 League of Legends data to assess the effectiveness of ADC and Mid roles in post-game performance and predict the role based on post-game statistics.

title: Analysis on the Impact of PokéStops Proximity on Restaurant Traffic
description: An investigation on the impact of Pokémon Go’s PokéStops on local restaurant traffic using Yelp check-in data.

title: Genre Classification based on Amazon Book Summaries
description: Built a classification model to predict book genres based on short summaries from over 200,000 book entries, using natural language processing techniques.

title: Predictive Modeling on Poker Optimal Strategies
description: A demonstraion on Bayesian networks and Monte Carlo models can optimize a goal-based AI agent’s decision-making in Poker through probabilistic reasoning and adaptability in a dynamic, partially observable environment.

title: Geospatial Visualization on Bike Routes in Boston
description: An interactive visualization of Boston's BlueBikes system using D3.js and Mapbox. Features include time-based filtering and bike route overlays for both Boston and Cambridge areas.

title: Gamified Unplugged: How Gamifying Surveys Reduces Cognitive Load
description: An interactive visualization of how gamified surveys affect cognitive load, using biometric data such as ECG and brain waves.

title: Predicting AirBnB Prices
description: A prediction on Airbnb prices using machine learning models like XGBoost and Gradient Boosting based on location, amenities and property features, ranking 7th out of 100+ participants.

title: Customer Segmentation Analysis
description: A comprehensive analysis using K-means clustering to identify distinct customer segments based on purchasing behavior and demographics.
